title: Brits brace for higher mortgage payments despite Bank of England seen cutting rates
content: Britons are facing the prospect of higher mortgages for longer even as the Bank of England readies to cut rates on Thursday.
summary: Britons are facing the prospect of higher mortgages for longer even as the Bank of England readies to cut rates on Thursday.

title: British fintech firm Wise posts 55% jump in profit on expanding market share
